definition: to share the booty/to divide ill-gotten gains

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: The thieves quarrel (l)ed with one another about how to divide the loot.
sentences.chinese: 小偷们为如何分赃而互相争吵。

sentences.english: What nation hath not inherited her kingdom, and gotten of her spoils?
sentences.chinese: 那一个民族没有占领过这国土，没有来劫掠分赃？

sentences.english: The accomplice of a thief is his own enemy.
sentences.chinese: 与盗贼分赃，是恨恶自己的性命。

sentences.english: I was very dusty and dirty and went up to my room to wash .
sentences.chinese: 我满身尘土十分赃，于是，上楼到我房间里去洗一下。

sentences.english: The robbers decided to whack up the profits from the robbery.
When they got to their forest hide-out they divided up the loot.
sentences.chinese: 他们回到森林里的藏身处分赃。

definition: (of a villain) to do the dirty on another villain
to hog/to keep everything for oneself
lit. one half equals zero point five (division rule in abacus reckoning)/to share fairly between two parties/to go fifty-fifty
